attributes.action: Ban eating Pigs in Blankets From any day of the year apart from Christmas Day.
attributes.additional_details: Because pigs in blankets don't taste the same if its not on CHRISTMAS.
attributes.background: I think pigs in blankets is a tradition only to be amended on Christmas day. And the it should be Illegal to eat Pigs in Blankets on any day what is not Christmas day!

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

It is up to individuals whether to eat pigs in blankets, either on Christmas Day or other days, not the Government or Parliament.
